line-9: As an Assistant Commercial Manager, you will be part of the wider W2BC Project team delivering works for the Transpennine Route Upgrade between Huddersfield and Stalybridge. You'll have an interesting and varied role, providing commercial support as required in accordance with established Network Rail policy. Day-to-day, you'll operate effectively in multi-disciplined teams, supporting both the Commercial Manager and project team. You will assist the Commercial Manager in pre-contract activities and evaluating and agreeing the value of payments and variations for a variety of works throughout the Route.
line-11: We need savvy, commercial team players to join our Transpennine Upgrade Team. You will be capable of working collaboratively with our stakeholders to deliver on time with a key eye for detail. If you are a highly motivated individual with a passion for success, driving growth and improvement, and embodying our core values, we would love to hear from you.Some of the key accountabilities of this role are:1. Assist in the measurement and evaluation of the commercial value of payments, monitoring the correct certification of works prior to authorisation in accordance with contractual obligations.2. Assist with the reporting on all commercial aspects of allocated projects.3. Assist in the preparation of contract specification and pre-tender documentation.4. Assist with the general procurement/commercial management on a variety of contract categories.5. Ability to self-manage own workload and communicate with various stakeholders across the portfolio. 6.
